title: Methane and nitrous oxide emissions in the rice-shrimp rotation system of the Vietnamese Mekong Delta

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 16

Author(s): Huynh Van Thao, Nguyen Van Cong, Le Thi Cam Nhung, Tran Hoang Kha, Huynh Cong Khanh, Le Van Dang, Nguyen Phuong Duy, Huynh Quoc Tinh, Trieu Nguyen Lan Vi, Nguyen Phuong Chi, Tran Sy Nam
